entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
